install.description: A plugin to add a link to aiContactSafe. Use it like this : {aicontactsafelink text=Link text|pf=1|aics_name=default name|field2_name=value field2}. "Link text" is the text used as link. "pf=1" means the profile with the id = 1 is used. "aics_name=default name" will set the default value of the field aics_name to "default name". You can use here all the fields defined in aiContactSafe.
